name: Multiplayer FPS - Shoot-out
description:
Shoot-out  First one to kill 10

Shoot-out is a 3D multiplayer game. Players can create and join the room. Once player have joined, master can start the room. First to fill 10 players will win the round. Player can join alone to explore the arena. 

The arena has three floors; basement, ground floor and upper level. There are stairs and platforms to reach one floor to another. Hiding spots are there, which makes this game more fun. 

Explore the map and play with your friends!
